title: Berkshire PHAB
description: Our connected ciriculum team designed a website for a local branch of the PHAB national charity. We learnt basic HTML, CSS and JavaScript. The design team included: Will Mann, Ben Hoggarth, Orr Bezalely, Vinh Le, Louis Desforges, Amael De Betak, Nate Oppenheimer under the supervision of Mr Hooper and Mr White.
